item.title: Last Polymath : D D Kosambi
item.description: “Young man, I find that people who know nothing about Kosambi want to talk about him! Let me tell you this: he was one of the finest intellects to come out of your country”. – M S Raghunathan, Current Science, 85(4) (2003), 526-36 (531). ** “The intellectual potentialities of the Indian nation are unlimited and not many years would perhaps be needed before India can take a worthy place in world mathematics.
